original: rjes las thob pa ni sgyu ma la sogs kyi ming lta bur yongs su shes so zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir snang ba yang ngo bo med pa dang / dngos po med kyang snang ba'i phyir de spyod do zhes kyang khas mi len ces bya ba la sogs pa ste dngos por snang ba tsam gyis mi spyod pa khas mi len la snang ba rang bzhin dang bral bas spyod par khas mi len pa'o //

translated: We do not accept that one does not engage in conduct because of the mere appearance of things. We do not accept that one engages in conduct because appearances are free from intrinsic existence.

analyzed: de lta bas de nyid nges pa'i don du bstan pa ni lha'i bu zhes gsungs te /
